items.description: An association of Content-Id with a Transaction Id for building the Audit Log later

status.description: Equals "success". Transmission Responses with a different status from Suppliers must be dismissed.

source.description:
Signature based on input:
```
receiver                + '\u2063' +
status                  + '\u2063'
source.domain           + '\u2063' +
source.timestamp        + '\u2063' +
seed.source.signature+ '\u2063' +
contents[0].transaction_id + '\u2063' +
contents[0].content_id + '\u2063' +
... + '\u2063' +
contents[n].transaction_id + '\u2063' +
contents[n].content_id
```
